Title: Search Functionality - Search by Title - Display Matching Books with Pagination

Action:
Pre-conditions:
User is logged into the library system or on the public search interface. The system has a populated database with books containing valid titles.
1. Navigate to the search interface.
Expected Result: 1. The system displays all books matching the exact or partial title entered.

Action: 2. Enter a valid book title (e.g., 'The Great Gatsby') in the search bar.
Expected Result: 2. Results are paginated with a maximum of 20 items per page (if applicable).

Action: 3. Submit the search query.

Cleanup:
Clear search query and log out if necessary.

Title: Search Functionality - Search by Author - Display Author's Books with Pagination

Action:
Pre-conditions:
User is on the search interface. The system contains books with valid author names in the database.
1. Navigate to the search interface.
Expected Result: 1. The system displays all books written by the specified author.

Action: 2. Enter a valid author name (e.g., 'J.K. Rowling') in the search bar.
Expected Result: 2. Results are paginated with a maximum of 20 items per page (if applicable).

Action: 3. Submit the search query.

Cleanup:
Clear search query.

Title: Search Functionality - Search by ISBN - Display Exact Book Record (No Pagination)

Action:
Pre-conditions:
User is on the search interface. The system contains books with valid ISBNs in the database.
1. Navigate to the search interface.
Expected Result: 1. The system displays the exact book record matching the entered ISBN.

Action: 2. Enter a valid ISBN (e.g., '978-0743273565') in the search bar.
3. Submit the search query.

Cleanup:
Clear search query.

Title: Cart Management - Verify Cart Limit (Max 10 Items) - Block 11th Item with Error

Action:
Pre-conditions:
User is logged into the system with an empty cart. The system enforces a cart limit of 10 items.
1. Navigate to the book catalog or search interface.
Expected Result: 1. The system allows the first 10 items to be added successfully.

Action: 2. Add 10 books to the cart.
Expected Result: 2. The 11th item is blocked with an error message: 'Cart limit reached (Max 10 items).'

Action: 3. Attempt to add an 11th book to the cart.

Cleanup:
Clear cart and log out if necessary.

Title: Search Functionality - Combined Search (Title, Author, ISBN) - Display Exact Match (No Pagination)

Action:
Pre-conditions:
User is on the search interface. The system contains books with matching Title, Author, and ISBN combinations.
1. Navigate to the search interface.
Expected Result: 1. The system displays the exact book record matching all three criteria.

Action: 2. Enter a valid Title (e.g., 'The Great Gatsby'), Author (e.g., 'F. Scott Fitzgerald'), and ISBN (e.g., '978-0743273565') in the respective fields.
3. Submit the search query.

Cleanup:
Clear search query.

Title: Search Functionality - Partial Match (Title and Author) - Display Matching Books with Pagination

Action:
Pre-conditions:
User is on the search interface. The system contains books matching partial Title and Author combinations.
1. Navigate to the search interface.
Expected Result: 1. The system displays all books matching both partial Title and Author criteria.

Action: 2. Enter a partial Title (e.g., 'Great G') and Author (e.g., 'F. Scott') in the respective fields.
Expected Result: 2. Results are paginated with a maximum of 20 items per page (if applicable).

Action: 3. Submit the search query.

Cleanup:
Clear search query.

Title: Pagination - Boundary Test (Exactly 20 Items) - Display All Items Without Next Page

Action:
Pre-conditions:
User is on the search interface. The system contains exactly 20 books matching the search criteria.
1. Navigate to the search interface.
Expected Result: 1. The system displays all 20 items on the first page.

Action: 2. Enter a search query that returns exactly 20 results (e.g., 'Title: Harry Potter').
Expected Result: 2. No 'Next Page' or pagination controls are shown.

Action: 3. Submit the search query.

Cleanup:
Clear search query.

Title: Pagination - Overflow Test (21+ Items) - Display Pagination Controls

Action:
Pre-conditions:
User is on the search interface. The system contains 21+ books matching the search criteria.
1. Navigate to the search interface.
Expected Result: 1. The system displays the first 20 items on Page 1.

Action: 2. Enter a search query that returns 21+ results (e.g., 'Author: Stephen King').
Expected Result: 2. A 'Next Page' or 'Page 2' navigation control is visible.

Action: 3. Submit the search query.
Expected Result: 3. Clicking 'Next Page' displays the remaining 1+ items on Page 2.

Action: 4. Click 'Next Page' or 'Page 2' navigation control.

Cleanup:
Clear search query.

Title: Cart Management - Verify Out-of-Stock Item Block - Display Error Message

Action:
Pre-conditions:
User is logged into the system with an empty cart. The system contains books with stock status (some in-stock, some out-of-stock).
1. Navigate to the book catalog or search interface.
Expected Result: 1. The system prevents the out-of-stock item from being added.

Action: 2. Locate a book marked as 'Out of Stock'.
Expected Result: 2. An error message is displayed: 'Item is currently out of stock.'

Action: 3. Attempt to add the out-of-stock book to the cart.

Cleanup:
Clear cart and log out if necessary.
